StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: Proc1992
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
--create a table variable to hold the countries DECLARE @countries table (ID int ,code varchar(2) ,[Name] varchar(80)) --Insert country code us .rst so it defaults to this. insert into @countries SELECT -2 AS ID ,Code ,[Name] FROM mcriss.usmc.vwCountries WHERE Code = 'US' --Insert the other countries in alphabe.cal order insert into @countries SELECT -1 AS ID ,Code ,[Name] FROM mcriss.usmc.vwCountries WHERE Code <> 'US' ORDER BY [Name]
select Code as Code, Name as Name from @countries order by id, [name] FOR XML PATH('Country'), ROOT('Countries')
